text: Ignatius Huang Shou-cheng (23 July 1923 - 30 July 2016) was a Chinese Roman Catholic bishop. Ordained to the priesthood in 1949, Huang Shou-cheng was clandestinely ordained a bishop in 1985 and then served as bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Funing, China.Diocese of Funing ==Notes== Category:1923 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Chinese Roman Catholic bishops Category:People from Fu'an
title: Ignatius Huang Shou-cheng
